channel.title: GFG on Code World
channel.description: Recent content in GFG on Code World

item.title: Move to Front
item.description: Question You are given the head of a Linked List. You have to move the last element to the front of the Linked List and return the list.

item.title: Delete Without Head Pointer
item.description: Question You are given a pointer/ reference to the node which is to be deleted from the linked list of N nodes. The task is to delete the node.

item.title: Max Min
item.description: Question [Problem of the day 13-10-2022] Given an array A of size N of integers. Your task is to find the sum of minimum and maximum element in the array.

item.title: Reverse Words in a Given String
item.description: Question Given a String S, reverse the string without reversing its individual words. Words are separated by dots. Example Input: S = i.like.this.program.very.much Output: much.very.program.this.like.i
